AnimationSequence

A class that managages the sequential playback of movements assigned to overlays.

Summary
AnimationSequence
A class that managages the sequential playback of movements assigned to overlays.
Functions
AnimationSequence
Initializes the Object
find_by_type
for_notice_displayed
This sequence is used for displaying small notices to the page that are supposed to fade away after a time-period.
for_item_found
This sequence is used for items found on the page.
for_st_nick_applied
This animation sequence used when a st.
for_mine_tripped
This animation sequence is used when a player steps on a mine.
for_portal_found
This sequence is used when a portal is displayed to the user.
for_lightpost_deployed
This sequence is used when a lightpost is deployed by a user.

for_notice_displayed

AnimationSequence.prototype.for_notice_displayed = function(in_queue)

This sequence is used for displaying small notices to the page that are supposed to fade away after a time-period.

Parameters

in_queueBoolean varible to determine if this animation happens within a message queue.
